title: MARK21
author: MARK21
content: It is somewhat surprising how NFTs are increasing, we hope that in these 5 years in the future they will be able to spread more. With the news reflecting growing interest in the non-fungible token (NFT) space among current investors, new research predicts that the current $3 billion market size will reach $13.6 billion by the end of 2027.QuoteIn the next five years, the key factors linked to the global rise of NFTs will continue to be the growing involvement of influencers, gaming communities, and the growing demand for digital artwork.Interestingly, the Mexican women's team was made known, launching a new NFT collection.Source of the Mexican women's team (In Spanish): https://es.cointelegraph.com/news/mexican-womens-soccer-team-launches-new-collection-of-nftsThe trend of the NFT market was also revealed, here is an image:Image: https://s3.cointelegraph.com/uploads/2022-05/0ebd8131-9816-4613-ab52-18330ed9db66.jpgGlobal NFT Market Trends.Source: MarketsandMarketsAlso MarketsandMarkets cited this trend:Quote"APAC countries are emerging towards constant developments and market launches in the given sector to offer creators and buyers the same opportunities in the ecosystem."Source (Spanish): https://es.cointelegraph.com/news/nft-market-well-positioned-to-grow-35-into-a-13-6b-industry-by-2027

NFT hype bubble is gone. No need to be a necromancer. Google trends shows that NFT was the most popular in 2-8 Jan 2022. Its May you know? the popularity of typing the NFT phrase decreased by 80%. "As per the CryptoSlam data, NFT global sales have dropped after their record highs in January this year. While a downturn is also witnessed in a number of unique buyers and sellers and hence further dragging down the total transactions." https://www.livemint.com/market/cryptocurrency/is-nft-market-losing-steam-global-sales-volume-halves-in-mar-11650200138313.htmlThis proves that NFT bubble popped in Jan and in april number of NFT trades dumped by half... I bet it dumped by another half in last month.And now in May 2022 some people are still excited about this? man... Its 6 month too late to be excited about this tech. Its about to dump 90-99% like with every new tech that just after bubble stage. Just like dot.com just like bitcoin in 2014 just like altcoins in 2018.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I doubt that. I am buying NFT but I don't consider keeping it that long. Investors will do the same if they see an opportunity to sell at a good profit. I suggest doing the same because right now there is uncertainty in every investment. People do grow tired of things easily now and soon they will find something new that will entertain them while making money. I believe there are NFTs that are made for the long term, but how rare are them will be the biggest question while keeping the value intact or more.

comments.author: vanesha
comments.body: NFT is still a mystery so far, I mean I believe the concept of NFT has not yet reached its final stage, they only focus on what NFT has achieved so far, there are still many projects that have not dared to try other things with NFT. In the past we always heard that NFT would become digital mail, but so far no one has been able to achieve it, maybe in a few years it will happen. We'll see the final NFT concept if we wait patiently for the next few years.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: NFT could grow bigger but NFT could down too because that is what happened in the crypto. If NFT trend can still get attention from people, NFT can grow and transform to better but if it's not, we may not see NFT like today because I think NFT can modify into a new form that can function better than now. For now, I think NFT still needs further development to be able to provide something different for people so it's likely that NFT will depend on the public's response.

comments.author: WellRozey
comments.body: Maybe or maybe not, coins and tokens are certain to grow higher in future but not NFTs, Metaverse is far from completion for now but once it's complete the hype will be back, to me NFTs can easily fail and be ignored more than Metaverse in near future.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: That's optimistic but I doubt it will come true in this era of cryptocurrencies. Don't you see what is happening? The POV is to make money in a short span of time and that means they will withdraw if they see gains. Then they get over it and find a new investment hype. There might be a chance you will be left alone waiting for that 35% that would not even come. What kind of NFT are you buying? It should have the feature of a possible long term investment.

Since November last year, the number of active NFT wallets has decreased from 119 thousand to 14 thousand: https://www.wsj.com/articles/nft-sales-are-flatlining-11651552616 In addition, eight months ago, an average of 225000 NFT were sold daily, now this value has dropped to 19000. Thus, we see that the interest among investors in NFT is steadily decreasing.
